/usr/bin/c++   -O2 -g -DNDEBUG    CMakeFiles/chapter03.dir/scenemultilight.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter03.dir/sceneperfragment.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter03.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter03.dir/scenefog.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter03.dir/scenedirectional.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter03.dir/scenetoon.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter03.dir/scenespot.cpp.o  -o chapter03 -rdynamic ../ingredients/libingredients.a /usr/local/lib/libglfw3.a -lGL -lpthread -lXrandr -lXxf86vm -lXi -lrt
